quests.name: Charcoal
quests.description: You don't have a furnace yet, but you can still try and burn some wood and see if you get charcoal out of it. Why not throw half a stack of wood into the combustion heater and see what happens?

quests.name: Pssst! Over here!
quests.description: Listen kiddo, I got a one time offer for ya. If you can get me a stack of wood, I'll give ya some gunpowder. Don't ask why I need this much wood, but this is an offer you shouldn't refuse. Now put the wood on the table...

quests.name: Stone Upgrades
quests.description: Use the polisher to polish some cobblestone. You can fashion these stones into gears and casings just like the wood!

quests.name: Smeltery
quests.description: Using your upgraded combustion set up, make some grout and smelt it into seared bricks. Then make all the neccesary blocks for the smeltery.

quests.name: Hammer Time!
quests.description: Use that combustion chamber to make some stone slabs. You may need to look up how the combustion chamber is set up, but you need to place the combustion heater inside a wooden casing. Then cover the air space above the Casing-Heater combination with planks. Then throw a piece of clay in the center air space and completely cover it. Feed the heater some fuel and wait until it heats up to 100 HU as that is what the recipe specifies in JEI. Then place your button on the heater, and click the button. Viola! You now have some slabs.

quests.name: Blaze It
quests.description: Combine charcoal and gunpowder to make a material known as blaze. With four handfuls of this you can form it into a block.

quests.name: Crafting Components
quests.description: Craft a crafting table and a wood polisher. The wood polisher will be your lifeline.

quests.name: Dirt
quests.description: Now that you have access to a combustion heater, you can do some basic combustion. Like turning plant matter into dirt! Just remember, any recipe that requires over 100 HU cannot be made in a wooden casing. The wooden casing's max temperature is 100 HU exactly.

quests.name: Cobblestone
quests.description: With this blaze block you can put a torch underneath it and make lava. With this lava you can make cobble stone.

quests.name: Stone Casings
quests.description: Stone Casings are upgraded casings that can handle up to 600 HU. This can be used to do more complex recipes like bulk craft blaze powder or make grout which can be turned into seared bricks.

quests.name: Reinforced Stone
quests.description: You can melt down sand, clay and stone into a reinforced stone mixture. The exact ratio is 4 cobblestone 1 clay ball and 2 sand equals 6 reinforced ingots. You need to pour this mixture onto a brick to get the ingot.

quests.name: Wooden Casing
quests.description: Use the new polisher you have to make some polished wood. It is a little more configurable than standard planks. Use the polished wood to make a gear, and then use that gear to form your first casing. Casings will be used to house many primitive machines!

quests.name: Combustion
quests.description: Find some gunpowder and surround it with polished wood to make a wooden heat component. Use this to make your first Combustion Heater.

quests.name: Furnace
quests.description: Use a some stone slabs, cobble, and blaze to construct a primitive smelting aparatus.

quests.name: Wood?
quests.description: You know what must be done...

quests.name: Stone Combustion Heater
quests.description: Each casing can only take their respective machines. So in order to fully use the potential of the stone casing, you'll need a heater that is combatible with it. The stone heater is set up the same way as the wooden one, except you use cobblestone instead of wood.

quests.name: Water
quests.description: Polish some wood and use it to make an extractor. You can pull the water from within the leaves. I reccommend making an infinite source using 2000mb of water so you don't have to do this over and over again.

quests.name: Clay
quests.description: Not only can the extractor succ water, it can also infuse it into other blocks. Try infusing some water into dirt.

quests.name: Hey Kid, it's me again!
quests.description: Listen kiddo, I gotta be up front with ya. I just learned a new way to get gunpowder. Take a hammer, take a bowl, and crush some charcoal up and mix it with clay. That's how I get so much gunpowder and can scam chumps like you for a stack of wood. Haha! Later kid.

quests.name: I got another job for you...
quests.description: I ran outta wood. Gosh diddly darnit. Maybe I should start my own tree farm... Hey kid, can you get me 64 Saplings? I know you love your precious gunpowder...
